Pignite (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0498: Tepig
Pokémon
#0500: Emboar →

Pignite has been featured on 6 different cards since it debuted in the Black & White expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Pignite cards are normally Fire-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Pignite

Pignite
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Pignite Black & White 17/114 Beginning Set   007/037
        Beginning Set +   007/034
        Beginning Set Pikachu Version   007/034
McDonald's Collection 2012   4/12        
Pignite Black & White 18/114 Black Collection 009/053
        Master Deck Build Box EX   003/046
Legendary Treasures 26/113 EX Battle Boost   018/093
Pignite Boundaries Crossed 25/149 National Beginning Set   007/034
Pignite Cosmic Eclipse 32/236 Remix Bout 014/064
Pignite Battle Styles 024/163 Single Strike Master 011/070
Pignite White Flare 012/086 White Flare 012/086
White Flare 097/086 White Flare 097/086


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
